Title: Implements automatic market rate increases for child care assistance
Summary: Implements automatic market rate increases for child care assistance such that assistance will be equal to one hundred percent of the applicable market-related payment rate established by the department.
LawCode: Amd ยง410-x, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to implementing automatic market rate increases for child care assistance
